tutorial.speak:
Once groups have added events to their calendars, an admin can create curated calendars, which contain events from multiple groups.
To add a new one, go to the calendars section of the B1 admin and click the "Add" icon.
Give it a name and click "Save".
Next Click on the "Manage Events" icon to select what appears on the calendar.
The actual events are added from the group pages, not the curated calendar. Here are you selecting which of those existing events to include. Click "Add" to begin.
Select a Group to include that groups events on this calendar and click "Save".
Those events will show up on the curated calendar. As new events are added to the group, they will automatically be included.
